content: If you've run out of juice from your gourd, consider consuming medicine to increase your max health, or swap to a Transformation Spell to survive attacks you may not otherwise live through.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellowbrow.md', within the main section titled 'Yellowbrow', specifically from the subsection 'Yellowbrow Boss Fight (Second Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
If you've run out of juice from your gourd, consider consuming medicine to increase your max health, or swap to a Transformation Spell to survive attacks you may not otherwise live through.
